actions.committee: Committee on Labor and Human Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Labor and Human Resources.

actions.in_committee: Committee on Labor and Human Resources
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Children, Family,Drugs and Alcohol.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Children, Family, Drugs and Alcoholism

official_title: A bill to establish the position of Associate Director for Special Populations in the National Institute on Alcohol Abuse and Alcoholism and in the National Institute on Drug Abuse.
subjects: Department of Health and Human Services

summary.text: Amends the Public Health Service Act to establish the position of Associate Director for Special Populations in the National Institute on Alcohol Abuse and Alcoholism and in the National Institute on Drug Abuse. Requires such Associate Directors to develop and coordinate prevention, treatment, research, and administrative policies and programs concerning the needs of women and minorities for the prevention and treatment of alcoholism, alcohol abuse, drug abuse, and related problems.

titles.title: A bill to establish the position of Associate Director for Special Populations in the National Institute on Alcohol Abuse and Alcoholism and in the National Institute on Drug Abuse.
